cover.title: Build Your Vote on EOS Rate
cover.paragraph: EOS Rate is a community-driven visual rating tool that allows EOS token holders to easily rate Block Producers in distinct categories onchain using their preferred EOS wallet to sign the transaction. Each EOS account can submit their rating for each Block Producer as many times as they like facilitating a "liquid democracy", however, the weighting is independent from the amount the EOS account holds. One account = one submission of equal weight. EOS Rate does not influence the account of the ratings, just present the facts in a visually appealing format.

subTopic.title: EOS Rate in Depth
subTopic.paragraph1: In this video Edgar Fernandez, co-founder of EOS Costa Rica, explains more in-depth the goals of EOS Rate, how it works and how you can get involved to help shape and maintain the tool.
subTopic.paragraph2: Learn about the roadmap and how EOS Rate unique radar component we call the "LEAF" (Liquid EOS Attribute Factors) allows users to quickly compared different block producers and "build" their 30 BP vote by filling in as much of the LEAF as possible to facilitate the most diverse group for the network. The LEAF also allows voters to compare different proxies by visualizing each of the underlying BP "leafs" the proxy represents.
